feature.label: Stack_Pasta
feature.description: Stack Pasta is an Eclipse Plug-in that enables you to search and get answers from Stack Overflow and other sites in Stack Exchange Network to Eclipse IDE. features - Search from stack via StackExchange API by typing your question or highlighting your source code/output to quickly search for solutions - Mark the question to favorite list - Download the question to read in offline mode - see your searching and view history - connect all history with database to work with youe team
feature.copyright: Stack Pasta is a free plugin Software.
feature.license: Stack Pasta is a free plugin Software.
